title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two instances of the Revert option in the menu.
OB: The bug report states that the Revert option appears twice in the popup menu.
EB: The Revert option should only appear once in the popup menu.
SR: Investigate the cause of the duplicate Revert option and implement a fix to ensure that it only appears once in the popup menu.
